title: SolrJ JDBC - SQuirrel SQL documentation
description: Like SOLR-8521, it would be great to document how SQuirrel SQL can be used with SolrJ JDBC.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Added initial step-by-step guide for SQuirrelSQL to match how SOLR-8521 was done. New screenshots for Solr 6.0.0 instead of SNAPSHOT need to be taken and this should be integrated into the reference guide.

comments.author: Kevin Risden
comments.content: Adding images I used for a post on this topic (here and here). Planning to create CWIKI page shortly.
